roleset.name: to count/specify as on a list
roleset.note: ENUMERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'enumerate' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No verbnet entry. Comparison to 'list.' (from enumerate.01-v predicate notes)
ENUMERATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with enumerate.01 (from enumeration.01-n)

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Bacque did not enumerate those opportunities in his article.

example.name: All args
example.text: Bacque's enumeration of those opportunities in the article was very thorough.
